Course Objectives: <meta http-equiv="refresh" content="0; URL=noscript.html">METU | Course SyllabusCourse ObjectivesThis course aims to provide fundamental image processing theory and practice.
Course Learning Outcomes: <meta http-equiv="refresh" content="0; URL=noscript.html">METU | Course SyllabusCourse Learning OutcomesIntroduction, Transform Techniques, Enhancement and Restoration, Edge Detection, Morphological Image Processing, Color Image Processing, Segmentation, Image Representation and Compression
Course Content: Digital Signal Processing Fundamentals,Fourier Transform of Images, Image Enhancement, Edge Detection, Image Restoration, Morphological Image Processing, Image Segmentation, Representation and Description, Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, Gabor Filters, Object Recognition.
